title: I want a new report option
body: Look if i can get report and banned for wanting a game to end faster cause its a 4v5 after top afked and the support is trolling making the game a 3v5 and the support is refusing to surrender then i wanna be able to report ppl for refusal to play the selected role this is nuts who even wants to adc cause of supports play crap like mundo bot lane or shaco support cause they are "1 tricks" and didnt get the role/champ they wanted and just troll the game cause no one wanted to give them what they wanted getting sick of it its gotten ever worse since zoe came out cause everyone wants to play her and no one wants her in their game

So you want a report option for playing off meta? Something that isnt against the rules! Let alone who decides what is/isnt off meta? What are we currently using as a Meta? Because by that logic every single game in your mind is a 2-1-2. These types of games survive because people like to try out new things. That why we have things like Graves Jungle, Sona/Raka Mid, Zyra/Morg Support, etc.

Not what i mean say your playing and your adcing then someone comes up and literally says im not supporting after you pick your champ and then they come into the lane and just start spell bombing the minions to take them from you or make you miss them stands there dancing under tower while your getting dove standing just far enough away to throw spells into the minion wave and take cs or clear waves.... or better yet my favorite is i dont wanna jungle ima just duo top lane

Thats trolling, but thats not what you wanted from your original post. Maybe next time you'd go more into detail as its coming off that you are upset people are just going offmeta. Remember Off Meta and trolling are two completely different things. Going with a certain champions on a role/lane they are not normally played on and still trying to win is Off Meta. What you just wrote in that response post is trolling and can be done with any champion in any role!
